DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy of 308-nm excimer laser for primary localized cutaneous amyloidosis treatment in Asians, pilot study.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of 308-nm Excimer Laser for Primary Localized Cutaneous Amyloidosis Treatment in Asians
DOC.criteria: Patients, aged >18 years old with lichen amyloidosis diagnosed by using clinical presentation and pathologic features Those with cutaneous amyloidosis associated systemic diseases Pregnancy or lactating woman Those who are allergic to urea, olive oil Those who are photosensitive to ultraviolet radiation Those who had been previously treated with medications/ radiation/ laser within 3 months for systemic and 1 month for topical therapy
